title: Mobile Media-Based Language Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer software proficiency and intermediate or higher-level understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Environment where learners flexibly access via digital devices, primarily utilizing self-directed learning content over real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners independently design language learning content using various mobile media tools (recording/editing apps, SNS-based collaboration platforms, etc.).
Learners perform formative assessments (quizzes, voice feedback, etc.) provided in mobile environments with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners independently resolve at least 90% of technical issues (storage management, compatibility problems, etc.) encountered while using mobile media.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
